00045 KosmosBroker::KosmosBroker(PropertiesPtr &cfg) {
00046   m_verbose = cfg->get_bool("Hypertable.Verbose");
00047 
00048   String meta_name = cfg->get_str("Kfs.MetaServer.Name");
00049   int meta_port = cfg->get_i16("Kfs.MetaServer.Port");
00050 
00051   KfsClientPtr kfsclient = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient(meta_name,
00052                                                                  meta_port);
00053   KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->SetDefaultClient(kfsclient);
00054 }

00060 
00061 void
00062 KosmosBroker::open(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname,
00063                    uint32_t bufsz) {
00064   int fd, local_fd;
00065   String abspath;
00066   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00067 
00068   HT_DEBUGF("open file='%s' bufsz=%d", fname, bufsz);
00069 
00070   if (fname[0] == '/')
00071     abspath = fname;
00072   else
00073     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00074 
00075   HT_DEBUG_OUT << "Open file: " << abspath << HT_END;
00076 
00077   fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_fd);
00078 
00079   if ((local_fd = clnt->Open(abspath.c_str(), O_RDONLY)) < 0) {
00080     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(fd);
00081     HT_ERRORF("open failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00082     report_error(cb, local_fd);
00083     return;
00084   }
00085 
00086   HT_INFOF("open( %s ) fd=%d local_fd=%d", fname, fd, local_fd);
00087 
00088   {
00089     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00090     OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataKosmos(local_fd, O_RDONLY));
00091 
00092     cb->get_address(addr);
00093 
00094     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00095 
00096     cb->response(fd);
00097   }
00098 }

00100 
00101 void
00102 KosmosBroker::create(ResponseCallbackOpen *cb, const char *fname,
00103     bool overwrite, int32_t bufsz, int16_t replication, int64_t blksz) {
00104   int fd, local_fd;
00105   int flags;
00106   String abspath;
00107   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00108 
00109   HT_DEBUGF("create file='%s' overwrite=%d bufsz=%d replication=%d blksz=%lld",
00110             fname, (int)overwrite, (int)bufsz, (int)replication, (Lld)blksz);
00111 
00112   if (fname[0] == '/')
00113     abspath = fname;
00114   else
00115     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00116 
00117   fd = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_fd);
00118 
00119   if (overwrite)
00120     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_TRUNC;
00121   else
00122     flags = O_WRONLY | O_CREAT | O_APPEND;
00123 
00124   if ((local_fd = clnt->Open(abspath.c_str(), flags)) < 0) {
00125     HT_ERROR_OUT <<"KfsClient::Open failed: file='"<< abspath
00126         << "' - "<< KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(fd) << HT_END;
00127     report_error(cb, local_fd);
00128     return;
00129   }
00130 
00131   HT_INFOF("create( %s ) fd=%d local_fd=%d", fname, fd, local_fd);
00132 
00133   {
00134     struct sockaddr_in addr;
00135     OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata(new OpenFileDataKosmos(local_fd, O_WRONLY));
00136 
00137     cb->get_address(addr);
00138 
00139     m_open_file_map.create(fd, addr, fdata);
00140 
00141     cb->response(fd);
00142   }
00143 }

00145 
00146 void KosmosBroker::close(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00147   if (m_verbose) {
00148     HT_INFOF("close fd=%d", fd);
00149   }
00150 
00151   m_open_file_map.remove(fd);
00152 
00153   cb->response_ok();
00154 }

00156 
00157 void
00158 KosmosBroker::read(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint32_t amount) {
00159   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00160   ssize_t nread;
00161   uint64_t offset;
00162   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00163   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00164 
00165   HT_DEBUGF("read fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00166 
00167   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00168     char errbuf[32];
00169     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00170     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00171     return;
00172   }
00173 
00174   offset = clnt->Tell(fdata->fd);
00175 
00176   if ((nread = clnt->Read(fdata->fd, (char *) buf.base, (size_t) amount)) < 0) {
00177     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nread);
00178     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00179               errmsg.c_str());
00180     report_error(cb, nread);
00181     return;
00182   }
00183 
00184   buf.size = nread;
00185 
00186   cb->response(offset, buf);
00187 
00188 }

00191 void
00192 KosmosBroker::append(ResponseCallbackAppend *cb, uint32_t fd, uint32_t amount,
00193                      const void *data, bool sync) {
00194   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00195   ssize_t nwritten;
00196   uint64_t offset;
00197   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00198   int res;
00199 
00200   HT_DEBUGF("append fd=%d amount=%d", fd, amount);
00201 
00202   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00203     char errbuf[32];
00204     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00205     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00206     return;
00207   }
00208 
00209   offset = clnt->Tell(fdata->fd);
00210 
00211   if ((nwritten = clnt->Write(fdata->fd, (const char *) data, (size_t) amount))
00212       < 0) {
00213     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nwritten);
00214     HT_ERRORF("write failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00215               errmsg.c_str());
00216     report_error(cb, nwritten);
00217     return;
00218   }
00219 
00220   if (sync && (res = clnt->Sync(fdata->fd)) < 0) {
00221     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00222     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, errmsg.c_str());
00223     report_error(cb, res);
00224     return;
00225   }
00226 
00227   cb->response(offset, nwritten);
00228 
00229   return;
00230 }

00233 void KosmosBroker::seek(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset) {
00234   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00235   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00236 
00237   HT_DEBUGF("seek fd=%lu offset=%llu", (Lu)fd, (Llu)offset);
00238 
00239   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00240     char errbuf[32];
00241     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00242     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00243     return;
00244   }
00245 
00246   if ((offset = (uint64_t) clnt->Seek(fdata->fd, offset, SEEK_SET))
00247       == (uint64_t) -1) {
00248     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(offset);
00249     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%lld - %s", fdata->fd, (Llu)offset,
00250               errmsg.c_str());
00251     report_error(cb, (int) offset);
00252     return;
00253   }
00254 
00255   cb->response_ok();
00256 }

00259 void KosmosBroker::remove(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *fname) {
00260   String abspath;
00261   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00262   int res;
00263 
00264   HT_DEBUGF("remove file='%s'", fname);
00265 
00266   if (fname[0] == '/')
00267     abspath = fname;
00268   else
00269     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00270 
00271   if ((res = clnt->Remove(abspath.c_str())) < 0) {
00272     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00273     HT_ERRORF("unlink failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00274     report_error(cb, res);
00275     return;
00276   }
00277 
00278   cb->response_ok();
00279 }

00282 void KosmosBroker::length(ResponseCallbackLength *cb, const char *fname) {
00283   String abspath;
00284   uint64_t length;
00285   int res;
00286   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00287   struct stat statbuf;
00288 
00289    HT_DEBUGF("length file='%s'", fname);
00290 
00291   if (fname[0] == '/')
00292     abspath = fname;
00293   else
00294     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;
00295 
00296   if ((res = clnt->Stat(abspath.c_str(), statbuf)) < 0) {
00297     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00298     HT_ERRORF("length (stat) failed: file='%s' - %s", abspath.c_str(),
00299               errmsg.c_str());
00300     report_error(cb, res);
00301     return;
00302   }
00303   length = statbuf.st_size;
00304   cb->response(length);
00305 }

00308 void
00309 KosmosBroker::pread(ResponseCallbackRead *cb, uint32_t fd, uint64_t offset,
00310                     uint32_t amount) {
00311   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00312   ssize_t nread;
00313   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00314   StaticBuffer buf(new uint8_t [amount], amount);
00315 
00316   HT_DEBUGF("pread fd=%d offset=%lld amount=%d", fd, (Lld)offset, amount);
00317 
00318   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00319     char errbuf[32];
00320     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00321     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00322     return;
00323   }
00324 
00325   // remember the last offset before pread()
00326   uint64_t offset_last = clnt->Tell(fdata->fd);
00327   
00328   if ((offset = (uint64_t) clnt->Seek(fdata->fd, offset, SEEK_SET))
00329       == (uint64_t) -1) {
00330     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(offset);
00331     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%lld - %s", fdata->fd, (Lld)offset,
00332               errmsg.c_str());
00333     report_error(cb, (int) offset);
00334     return;
00335   }
00336 
00337   if ((nread = clnt->Read(fdata->fd, (char *) buf.base, (size_t) amount)) < 0) {
00338     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(nread);
00339     HT_ERRORF("read failed: fd=%d amount=%d - %s", fdata->fd, amount,
00340               errmsg.c_str());
00341     report_error(cb, nread);
00342     return;
00343   }
00344 
00345   // restore the last offset when pread() done
00346   if ((offset = (uint64_t) clnt->Seek(fdata->fd, offset_last, SEEK_SET)) == (uint64_t) -1) {
00347     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(offset_last);
00348     HT_ERRORF("lseek failed: fd=%d offset=%lld - %s", fdata->fd,
00349               (Lld)offset_last, errmsg.c_str());
00350     report_error(cb, (int)offset);
00351     return;
00352   }
00353 
00354   buf.size = nread;
00355 
00356   cb->response(offset, buf);
00357 }

00359 
00360 void KosmosBroker::mkdirs(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *dname) {
00361   String absdir;
00362   String::size_type curr = 0;
00363   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00364   int res = 0;
00365   struct stat statbuf;
00366 
00367   HT_DEBUGF("mkdirs dir='%s'", dname);
00368 
00369   if (dname[0] == '/')
00370     absdir = dname;
00371   else
00372     absdir = m_root_dir + "/" + dname;
00373 
00374   String path;
00375   while (curr != String::npos) {
00376     curr = absdir.find('/', curr + 1);
00377     if (curr != String::npos)
00378       path.assign(absdir, 0, curr);
00379     else
00380       path = absdir;
00381 
00382     if (clnt->Stat(path.c_str(), statbuf) == 0) {
00383       if (!S_ISDIR(statbuf.st_mode)) {
00384         res = -ENOTDIR;
00385         break;
00386       }
00387       continue;
00388     }
00389 
00390     res = clnt->Mkdir(path.c_str());
00391     if (res < 0)
00392       break;
00393   }
00394 
00395   if (res < 0) {
00396     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00397     HT_ERRORF("mkdirs failed: dname='%s' - %s", absdir.c_str(), errmsg.c_str());
00398     report_error(cb, res);
00399     return;
00400   }
00401 
00402   cb->response_ok();
00403 }

00406 void KosmosBroker::rmdir(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *dname) {
00407   String absdir;
00408   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00409   int res;
00410 
00411   HT_DEBUGF("rmdir dir='%s'", dname);
00412 
00413   if (dname[0] == '/')
00414     absdir = dname;
00415   else
00416     absdir = m_root_dir + "/" + dname;
00417 
00418   if ((res = clnt->Rmdirs(absdir.c_str())) != 0) {
00419     if (res != -ENOENT && res != -ENOTDIR) {
00420       string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00421       HT_ERRORF("rmdir failed: dname='%s' - %s", absdir.c_str(),
00422                 errmsg.c_str());
00423       report_error(cb, res);
00424       return;
00425     }
00426   }
00427 
00428   cb->response_ok();
00429 }

00431 
00432 void KosmosBroker::flush(ResponseCallback *cb, uint32_t fd) {
00433   OpenFileDataKosmosPtr fdata;
00434   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00435   int res;
00436 
00437   HT_DEBUGF("flush fd=%d", fd);
00438 
00439   if (!m_open_file_map.get(fd, fdata)) {
00440     char errbuf[32];
00441     sprintf(errbuf, "%d", fd);
00442     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf);
00443     return;
00444   }
00445 
00446   if ((res = clnt->Sync(fdata->fd)) < 0) {
00447     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(res);
00448     HT_ERRORF("flush failed: fd=%d - %s", fdata->fd, errmsg.c_str());
00449     report_error(cb, res);
00450     return;
00451   }
00452 
00453   cb->response_ok();
00454 }

00462 void KosmosBroker::shutdown(ResponseCallback *cb) {
00463   m_open_file_map.remove_all();
00464   cb->response_ok();
00465   poll(0, 0, 2000);
00466 }

00469 void KosmosBroker::readdir(ResponseCallbackReaddir *cb, const char *dname) {
00470   std::vector<String> listing;
00471   std::vector<String> stripped_listing;
00472   String abs_path;
00473   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00474   int error;
00475 
00476   HT_DEBUGF("readdir dir_name='%s'", dname);
00477 
00478   if (dname[0] == '/')
00479     abs_path = dname;
00480   else
00481     abs_path = m_root_dir + "/" + dname;
00482 
00483   if ((error = clnt->Readdir(abs_path.c_str(), listing)) < 0) {
00484     string errmsg = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(error);
00485     HT_ERRORF("readdir failed: file='%s' - %s", abs_path.c_str(),
00486               errmsg.c_str());
00487     report_error(cb, error);
00488     return;
00489   }
00490 
00491   for (size_t i=0;i<listing.size(); i++) {
00492          if (listing[i] == "." || listing[i] == "..")
00493            continue;
00494          stripped_listing.push_back(listing[i]);
00495        }
00496 
00497   HT_INFOF("Sending back %d listings", (int)stripped_listing.size());
00498 
00499   cb->response(stripped_listing);
00500 }

00509   if (fname[0] == '/')
00510     abspath = fname;
00511   else
00512     abspath = m_root_dir + "/" + fname;

00518 void
00519 KosmosBroker::rename(ResponseCallback *cb, const char *src, const char *dst) {
00520   KfsClientPtr clnt = KFS::getKfsClientFactory()->GetClient();
00521   int error;
00522 
00523   HT_DEBUGF("rename %s -> %s", src, dst);
00524 
00525   String abs_src =
00526     format("%s%s%s", m_root_dir.c_str(), *src == '/' ? "" : "/", src);
00527   String abs_dst =
00528     format("%s%s%s", m_root_dir.c_str(), *dst == '/' ? "" : "/", dst);
00529 
00530   if ((error = clnt->Rename(src, dst)) < 0)
00531     report_error(cb, error);
00532   else
00533     cb->response_ok();
00534 }

00537 void
00538 KosmosBroker::debug(ResponseCallback *cb, int32_t command,
00539                     StaticBuffer &serialized_parameters) {
00540   HT_ERRORF("debug command %d not implemented.", command);
00541   cb->error(Error::NOT_IMPLEMENTED, format("Unsupported debug command - %d",
00542             command));
00543 }
00544 
00545 
00546 void KosmosBroker::report_error(ResponseCallback *cb, int error) {
00547 
00548   string errbuf = KFS::ErrorCodeToStr(error);
00549 
00550   error *= -1;
00551 
00552   if (error == ENOTDIR || error == ENAMETOOLONG || error == ENOENT)
00553     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILENAME, errbuf.c_str());
00554   else if (error == EACCES || error == EPERM)
00555     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_PERMISSION_DENIED, errbuf.c_str());
00556   else if (error == EBADF)
00557     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_BAD_FILE_HANDLE, errbuf.c_str());
00558   else if (error == EINVAL)
00559     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_INVALID_ARGUMENT, errbuf.c_str());
00560   else
00561     cb->error(Error::DFSBROKER_IO_ERROR, errbuf.c_str());
00562 }
